Power Chord.name: Power Chord
Power Chord.blurb: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
Power Chord.description: Aura: Sona's basic abilities each generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers her and all allied champions who enter its radius, also incurring a 0.5 seconds period during which she cannot cast her other basic abilities.
Power Chord.description2: Power Chord: After casting 3 basic abilities, Sona's next basic attack deals 20 −  240 (based on level) (+ 20% AP)  bonus magic damage, with an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
Power Chord.description3: Power Chord resets Sona's basic attack timer.
Power Chord.notes:
* Sona has a stack counter under her health-bar that is not visible to other champions.
 When Power Chord is ready, Sona gains a ring around her. This ring will have a different color depending on the last ability used ( blue,  green or  purple).
 The effect does not change if abilities are used while the projectile is in motion.

 The triggering attack will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal.

Hymn of Valor.name: Hymn of Valor
Hymn of Valor.blurb: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
Hymn of Valor.description: Active: Sona sends out two bolts of sound that deal magic damage to the nearest enemies, prioritizing champions.
Hymn of Valor.description2: Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 3 seconds.
Hymn of Valor.description3: Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals  28 −  336 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage.    40% bonus magic damage.
Hymn of Valor.notes:
* Hymn of Valor's aura doesn't trigger spell effects.
 Even if both bolts hit the same enemy they can only be damaged by one.
 Hymn of Valor will only target enemy units if Sona has sight of them.
 If the target gets out of sight before the projectile hits them they will still be damaged.

Aria of Perseverance.name: Aria of Perseverance
Aria of Perseverance.blurb: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
Aria of Perseverance.description: Active: Sona  heals herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
Aria of Perseverance.description2: Aura: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.
Aria of Perseverance.description3: Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces its target's size and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.
Aria of Perseverance.notes: * If no one is injured Aria of Perseverance will target the closest allied champion.

Song of Celerity.name: Song of Celerity
Song of Celerity.blurb: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
Song of Celerity.description: Active: Sona gains 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
Song of Celerity.description2: Aura: Tagged allied champions gain  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
Song of Celerity.leveling2:
Aura Bonus Movement Speed:
10 / 11 / 12 / 13 / 14% (+ 3% per 100 AP)
Song of Celerity.description3: Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord  slows its target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds.

Crescendo.name: Crescendo
Crescendo.blurb: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
Crescendo.description: Passive: Reduces the base  cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
Crescendo.description2: Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Sona plays an irresistible chord in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemy champions struck and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
Crescendo.notes: * Aesthetic: Enemies  stunned by Crescendo are forced to dance and perform their moves 50% faster for its duration.
